refnamediv.refpurpose: Used to precisely control the translation of an object in both primitive edit and matrix edit modes.

refsection.para: Used to precisely control the translation of an object in both primitive edit and matrix edit modes. The keypoint of the edited object or shape is translated to the specified coordinates.
The example shows the use of the translate command to move a currently edited object to specified model coordinates.

info.title: Move a currently edited object to specified coordinates.

example.para: Moves a currently edited object to the model coordinates (10 20 30).
